snippet: While studying Mr. Romney months ago, the Bush team tried to learn from his mistakes, according to aides, since the men share many similarities.
abstract: Jeb Bush's campaign team has been looking to Mitt Romney's 2012 general election campaign for insight into how to address widespread impression that Bush is unable to relate to people; two men share many similarities, including difficulty connecting with voters.
lead_paragraph: While studying Mr. Romney months ago, the Bush team tried to learn from his mistakes, according to aides, since the men share many similarities.

headline.main: To Help Jeb Bush Connect, Aides Look to Mitt Romney’s Missteps
headline.print_headline: To Help Bush Connect, Aides Look at Missteps of Romney Campaigns

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Right to Rise Policy Solutions Inc
